text: Several people are named Hermann Muller or Hermann Müller: #Hermann Müller (1829–1883), German botanist who investigated coevolution between bees and flowers. Name has umlaut. #H.J. Muller (1890–1967), American geneticist who investigated mutations. Name has no umlaut. #Hermann Müller (SPD) Foreign Minister of Germany, 21 June 1919-26 March 1920. SPD party.
title: Hermann Muller
